value.original: Doubtful Debts Process
Doubtful debts are those debts which a business or individual is unlikely to be able to collect.

row.value: Doubtful debts are those debts which a business or individual is unlikely to be able to collect.

value.original: Doubtful debts are those debts which a business or individual is unlikely to be able to collect. The reasons for potential non payment can include disputes over supply, delivery, at the conditioner of item or the appearance of financial stress within a customer's operations. When such a dispute occurs it is prudent to add this debt or portion thereof to the doubtful debt reserve.

row.value: Doubtful debts are those debts which a business or individual is unlikely to be able to collect. The reasons for potential non payment can include disputes over supply, delivery, at the conditioner of item or the appearance of financial stress within a customer's operations. When such a dispute occurs it is prudent to add this debt or portion thereof to the doubtful debt reserve.
